name: ESTATE of Nellie SELINSKY, Deceased. Appeal of Julia GRICAR, Caveator

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: ESTATE of Nellie SELINSKY, Deceased. Appeal of Julia GRICAR, Caveator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Washington County is affirmed. Each party is to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Davis G. Yohe, Peacock, Keller, Yohe, Day & Ecker, Washington, for appellant.
Kris A. Vanderman, Murphy, France & Vanderman, Charleroi, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 213
ESTATE of Nellie SELINSKY, Deceased. Appeal of Julia GRICAR, Caveator.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 1, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
Davis G. Yohe, Peacock, Keller, Yohe, Day & Ecker, Washington, for appellant.
Kris A. Vanderman, Murphy, France & Vanderman, Charleroi, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
